div.h4: You are at a meeting with Jack and Jill. You have a problem. In the summer the campsite is filled with foreign turists. The rest of the year the campsite is almost empty. You want to come up with ideas about how to get more guests outside of the summer season.
div.h6: Write in the field below. Press 'Enter' each time you have written an idea. While you write, you can see Jack and Jill's ideas on the screen. Click on the text in the large area when you are ready to begin brainstorming. Go on to the next task when you are out of ideas. The brainstorm will automatically end after 3 minutes.
